p: Supplementary Data S3: DAVID functional annotation enrichment and clusters. The six enriched functional clusters are shown, including the MtzR lines in which enrichment was observed, and the GO annotation and/or Interpro domains around which the functional clusters were selected. The Giardia identifiers of each of the DEPs involved with the designated Interpro and GO annotations are listed within each of the three Giardia MtzR lines.
